page.title: 14SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
The Manor House at Upper Upham reputedly has two ghosts. The first is that of a lady of Upham House who was murdered and her spirit walks in the twilight around the Tudor Mansion and in the Italian grounds. A former member of the staff was said to be tucked up in bed by her. Her hearse (horse drawn) goes slowly down from the heights to Aldbourne (a nearby village).
The second ghost is that of a mother whose daughter was killed in a riding accident. She walks the grounds calling her daughter's name. At the time a schoolroom next to the Chapel remained just as the young lady left it.
